value:
Oh, this? It's a hagoita. In Hoshido,
we use these to play a game called
hanetsuki. I've never lost a match.

Every year, the first trip I make is to a
shrine. So imagine my surprise when
I instead found myself in some ruins!$k$pI guess this year my first trip is to visit
a powerful summoner instead.

Doesn't all of the bustle around the
new year make you hungry? It isn't
much, but I did bring some osechi.$k$pThat's what we call the foods we eat
at the start of a new year. They can
be quite a feast sometimes!

Who was the first Hero you
summoned this year? They were the
first to answer your call, so...$k$pWell, you should hold that memory
especially dear.

Just...like...this! Adjusting the obi on a
kimono seems complicated, but it's
simple once you get the hang of it.$k$pIf you ever want to try wearing one, I'd
be happy to teach you the proper way
to put it on.

Happy New Year. I bear the greetings
of $Nf.$k$pMay your friendship blossom in this
new year!

An auspicious start to the year.
How delightful.

I hope I can grow strong like
this each and every year.

An ill omen... As though I pulled
a bad fortune from a shrine.

Is this your New Year's gift to me?
Thank you.

Happy New Year! I'm Azura. I was
heading out for my first shrine visit
of the new year, but...$k$pSomehow I wound up here, instead.

I just love New Year's. The crisp air at
the break of dawn truly makes it feel
like a new start.$k$pHmm, I know... Let's celebrate with a
song, shall we? What kind of music
do you enjoy?$k$pI like songs that remind me of people
from my past. To be honest, those
songs can make me feel lonely...$k$pBut when I sing them, I feel like my
thoughts and feelings can reach
someone no matter the distance.$k$pThough, maybe it's best to ring in the
new year with a happier song.$k$pI don't want to sing for people who
are far away. I'd rather sing for you,
right here in front of me.$k$pI'm so happy to have met you. I'll sing
to show you my gratitude, so I hope
I can stay by your side all year.
えい
せいっ
ううっ
This isn't good.
Happy New Year!
Let's celebrate!
Make your resolutions!
New year, new resolve!
What a start...
Heehee
May this year bring us both good fortune.
I hope your new year is full of wonder.
What do you think of my outfit? It's quite fine, don't you agree?
Singing in the New Year is always such fun!
In Hoshido, our New Year's treats come in pretty packages. It's a feast for the eyes!
Have you done all of your summoning yet for the new year?
I've spent many New Years in Hoshido. Now I'm glad to spend this one here with you.
Hmm?
Best wishes.
Of course.
